scripts.test:local: cd solidity-backend && npx hardhat test test/kuiper.ts --network hardhat
scripts.deploy:local: cd solidity-backend && npx hardhat run scripts/deploy.ts --network hardhat
scripts.deploy:goerli: cd solidity-backend && npx hardhat run scripts/deploy.ts --network goerli
scripts.console:local: cd solidity-backend && npx hardhat console --network localhost
